item.title: Linux裁剪图片+OCR识别
item.description: Linux裁剪图片+OCR识别 安装： 1 2 3 4 5 sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/Alexander_Pozdnyakov/CentOS_7/ sudo rpm --import https://build.opensuse.org/projects/home:Alexander_Pozdnyakov/public_key sudo yum update sudo yum install tesseract # sudo yum install tesseract-langpack-deu 裁剪：convert zlpic.jpg -crop 300x50+268+600 zlpic1.jpg 识别： 1 2 tesseract zlpic1.jpg out cat out.txt
